籤詩版本二:
Mwedzi unopenya mudenga mumba makanyarara, ndakaerekana ndarohwa nemakore nemhute ndokuwira pakoma.
Ndapota namatira runyararo rwepfungwa, Yunxia Powder, shandura rudo panguva ino, uye nyora bhuku mumba.
詩意:
Mune iyi hexagram, makore nemhute zvinofukidza mwedzi.
Ramba kunzira dzekare kunyangwe zvinhu zvikasashanda.
籤詩故事一:
◇Iye Wenxiu akaurayiwa
Munguva yeJiajing yeMing Dynasty, He Wenxiu akaumbwa nemakurukota anonyengera uye mhuri yake yakanga iri mudambudziko.Iye Wenxiu akabatsirwa naLan Ying, Mambokadzi weMutungamiriri weNyika, uye vaviri vacho vakaroorana vari voga. Iye Wenxiu akapomerwa zvenhema nemhondi Zhang Tang ndokuiswa mujeri. Akazonunurwa ndokuva gavhuna mushure mekupasa bvunzo. Wenxiu akawana kwaive naWang Lanying uye akapfeka sesvikiro kuti azive. Vaviri ava vakazobatanidzwazve, uye Zhang Tang akaurayiwa.
聖意: Kusagadzikana kumba, ndinonamatira dziviriro, matambudziko emari, matambudziko ebhizinesi, matambudziko ewanano, kushomeka kweLiujia, vanofamba netsoka vachivharira minda, kukuvara kwemakonye, ​​kukuvadzwa kwezvipfuyo, vanhu vakashaikwa, kumatare edzimhosva, kutama, pfuma yakarasika, kurwara, guva remugomo reYan'an rinofanira kugadziriswa
